mapper.insert:
select notice_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice values(#{notice_num}, 1, #{sort_num}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from ( select n.notice_num, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_regdate, s.sort_name, s.sort_num ,m.member_num from notice n , sort s, member m where n.sort_num = s.sort_num and n.member_num = m.member_num order by n.notice_num desc ) a

select a.* from ( select n.notice_title, n.notice_content, s.sort_name, d.* from notice n, notice_detail d, sort s, member m where n.sort_num = s.sort_num and n.member_num = m.member_num and n.notice_num = d.notice_num ) a where notice_num = #{notice_num}

select a.* from ( select n.notice_title, n.notice_content,n.notice_num,s.sort_name from notice n, sort s, member m where n.sort_num = s.sort_num and n.member_num = m.member_num ) a where notice_num = #{notice_num}
select notice_detail_num from notice_detail where notice_num = #{notice_num}
mapper.delete: delete from ( select n.*, s.sort_name, d.notice_detail_num, d.notice_orgfile, d.notice_savefile, d.notice_filesize from notice n, notice_detail d, sort s where n.sort_num = s.sort_num and n.notice_num = d.notice_num ) where notice_num=#{notice_num}
mapper.select: SELECT no.*, rownum FROM ( SELECT notice_num, notice_title, notice_content, notice_regdate FROM notice ORDER BY notice_regdate DESC )no WHERE rownum <= 3
